entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 near the river this morning and early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
